hibernate apps that run in the background and leach battery power and also burn up ram with that app alone the phone responded better quicker and more reliably good choice for this phonecall quality is every bit as exceptional as an iphone the volume control has a wide range and can accommodate many environmental conditions like the flightline where i work colors on the display are sharp and distinct and the touch feature is accuratebattery life is a little iffy at times if used throughout the day you might get 10 hours of life if used more it could easily drop to 6 as it frequently does for me although recharging is fairly rapid takes about 90 minutes to charge fully it is not always possible to charge the phone in certain locationsa very good phone for the price i highly recommend the phone for all smart phone users who dont utilize a lot of apps in their life
